thread.title: Be Prepared for a $75 Late Checkout Fee
thread.title_full: Be Prepared for a $75 Late Checkout Fee - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marc L
title: Be Prepared for a $75 Late Checkout Fee
text: I had communicated a late check out in advance at this hotel. They indicated they did not have this on record. When I walked out of the hotel a few minutes past noon, they said I was going to be charged a $75 late checkout fee. This is outrageous considering the housekeepers still had several other rooms to clean, and I was only checking out a few MINUTES after the prescribed checkout time. I would not recommend this hotel. The staff was rude about my requests to refund the late checkout fee.
